channel.title: Pendleton|Umatilla County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Pendleton|Umatilla County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-30 West at OR-37 North
item.description: US-30 west at OR-37 north to Holdman. Continue west on US-30 for Airport and I-84.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching OR-37 Jct. at Umatilla River Bridge.
item.description: US-30 West approaching OR-37 Jct. crossing the Umatilla River bridge.

item.title: US-30 West/OR-11 South at US-30/OR-11 Split
item.description: US-30 West/OR-11 South at US-30/OR-11 Split in Pendleton. Turn left for OR-11 south to I-84/US-395 to Portland and La Grande. Continue straight for US-30 West to City Center.

item.title: US-30 West/OR-11 South - I-84 West Next Left
item.description: US-30 West/OR-11 South approaching US-30/OR-11 Split in Pendleton. Turn left for I-84 West to Portland.

item.title: US-30 West/OR-11 South (Court St.) at US-30/OR-11 Split
item.description: US-30 West/OR-11 South (Court St.) at US-30/OR-11 split in Pendleton.

item.title: US-30 West at OR-11
item.description: US-30 West at OR-11. Use OR-11 north for Milton-Freewater and Walla Walla (Washington). Continue west on US-30 for City Center and Information Center. OR-11 south joins US-30 west for a short distance through Pendleton.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching OR-11
item.description: US-30 West approaching OR-11 North in Pendleton.

item.title: Begin OR-11 North at I-84
item.description: Begin OR-11 north at I-84 onramp. Turn right for I-84 east to La Grande; continue straight for OR-11 north to City Center (Pendleton) and for I-84 west onramp to Portland.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 210 Offramp at OR-11
item.description: I-84 East Exit 210 Offramp at OR-11 junction. Turn left for OR-11 north to City Center (Pendleton) and Milton-Freewater. Turn right for ODOT office.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 210 Offramp at OR-11
item.description: I-84 East Exit 210 Offramp at OR-11 junction. Turn left for OR-11 north to City Center (Pendleton) and Milton-Freewater. Turn right for ODOT office.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 209
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 209 - US-395 South/Pendleton/John Day. US-395 joins I-84 west to Stansfield.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 207
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 207 - US-30/Airport/Pendleton City Center/National Historic District. US-30 leaves I-84 here, serving as the Pendleton business loop. US-30 rejoins I-84 on the east side of Pendleton.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 213
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 213 - US-30/Pendleton City Center/National Historic District

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 210
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 210 - OR-11/Pendleton/Milton-Freewater.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching I-84
item.description: US-395 north approaching I-84. Use left lane for I-84 West/US-395 North to Pasco and Spokane (both in Washington via US-395).

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 209
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 208 - US-395 South/OR-37/Pendleton/John Day. US-395 joins I-84 west to Stanfield, Oregon.

item.title: US-30 East at OR-11 (To I-84)
item.description: US-30 east at OR-11. Turn right for OR-11 south to I-84, and Portland. Continue straight for US-30 East/OR-11 North/To I-84 East/Milton Freewater/Walla Walla.

item.title: US-30 East Approaching OR-11
item.description: US-30 east approaching OR-11. Use OR-11 south to I-84 West/Portland.

item.title: US-30 East to US-395 South - Pendleton
item.description: US-30 east at Court St. - To US-395 South/John Day/Pilot Rock. Continue east on US-30 for (Pendleton) City Center and (I-84) Freeway East.

item.title: US-30 East at OR-37 North
item.description: US-30 east at at OR-37 north to Holdman.

item.title: US-30 East Approaching OR-37
item.description: US-30 east approaching OR-37 North to Holdman.

item.title: US-30 East at Pendleton Airport Jct.
item.description: US-30 east at Airport Road to (Pendleton) Airport and Oregon Department of Forestry unit office. Continue east on US-30 for (Blue Mountain) Community College and (Pendleton) City Center.

item.title: US-30 at I-84/US-395 Exit 207 Westbound Onramp
item.description: US-30 East at onramp to I-84/US-30 West/US-395 North to Portland (Exit 207).

item.title: US-30 at I-84/US-395 Exit 207 Onramp
item.description: US-30 east at I-84 (Exit 207) onramp. Merge right for I-84 East/US-395 South to La Grande; continue over freeway for I-84/US-30 West/US-395 North, and for (Pendleton) Airport, (Blue Mountain) Community College, and (Pendleton) City Center.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 207 Offramp at US-30 Jct
item.description: I-84 East - Exit 207 offramp. Turn left for US-30 west to (Pendleton) Airport, Blue Mountain Community College, and (Pendleton) City Center. Turn right for Justice Center.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 207
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 207 - US-30 East/Airport/Pendleton City Center/National Historic District.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 207
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 207, Airport/West Pendleton.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 209
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 209, US-395 South/OR-37/Pendleton/John Day.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 210
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 210, Pendleton.
